title: Kattipidi Lyrics Vettai Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Singers: Vijay Prakash, Shwetha Pandit
Song: Kattipidi
Lyrics: Na.Muthukumar

Kattipidi enna Kattipidi
ne eppodhum kuthaaadha roja sedi
Vittu pudi enna thotu pidi
idhu villendhi vilayadum vettai adi

Niram maarum poo neeyadi
unna parikaamal thoduthaen adi
Annaiyaadha thee neeyadi
unnai annaikaamal annaithaen adi

Kattipidi enna Kattipidi
naan eppodhum kuthaadha roja chedi
vittuppidi enna thottuppidi
naan vittaalum thottaadum mullai kodi

Ye konji pesadi kutti-ma, konnu podadi chellama
kaiyyum odala, kaalum odala, ellaam unnaala
Ye seeri paayada singama, vetti podada thangama
enna venumo kaetu vaangiko, rendu kannaala

Adi aavaaaram poovukku, aalillaa theevukku
Orange-u mala megam naandhaan-adi
Adi pogaadha oorukku, pollaaadha kaattukku
rendaaga kaikorthu phovom-adi

Ada ennamo pannura, ennamo sollura
kathaadi pol nenju koothaadudhe

Indha mutham thaan podhuma, innum onnuthaan venuma
indha kannama, andha kannama veru ennaamma?

Enna kaetkathaan venuma, udhadu kaetuthaan theenduma
Mothamaaga ne kattikollada
naan un kannamma

Adi maama-nu nee solla, yemmaa-nu naan solla
aamaa-nu ulloora kalloorudhe

Adi azhagaaga nee thulla, palagaadha siru pulla
Idhu enna pudhu podhai thallaadudhe..

Ada ennamo pannura, ennamo sollura
kathaadi pol nenju koothaadudhe

Kattipidi enna Kattipidi
ne eppodhum kuthaaadha roja sedi
Vittu pudi enna thotu pidi
idhu villendhi vilayadum vettai adi

Niram maarum poo neeyadi
unna parikaamal thoduthaen adi
Annaiyaadha thee neeyadi
unnai annaikaamal annaithaen adi
